context: Tests whether the agent follows the CFP abstract writing workflow from the skill: lighter Phase 0-1, skips Phase 2, and produces the required deliverables (title, abstract within word count, takeaways count, and speaker bio).

checklist.name: Abstract word count
checklist.description: The abstract is between 200 and 300 words (inclusive)

checklist.name: Takeaway count
checklist.description: The submission includes between 3 and 5 key takeaways as bullet points

checklist.name: Speaker bio included
checklist.description: A speaker bio is included, drawing from the profile's bio_short and bio_context fields

checklist.name: Title present
checklist.description: The submission includes a talk title that relates to the AI code assistants topic

checklist.name: Presentation spec produced
checklist.description: A separate presentation spec document is produced with at least: title, thesis, audience, venue, and mode fields

checklist.name: Spec includes mode
checklist.description: The presentation spec references a mode from the speaker profile (e.g., 'Myth Buster') rather than inventing a new mode

checklist.name: No full architecture
checklist.description: The output does NOT include a full rhetorical architecture (no instrument selection menu, no slide budget, no outline sections) — the CFP workflow skips the architecture phase

checklist.name: Speaker voice in abstract
checklist.description: The abstract reflects the speaker's voice — contains at least one of: a provocative framing, a bold claim, or a myth-busting angle (not generic academic prose)

checklist.name: Spec includes duration
checklist.description: The presentation spec captures the duration target (30 or 45 minutes based on the conference slot options)

checklist.name: Spec includes profanity register
checklist.description: The presentation spec includes a profanity register setting (informed by the per_audience calibration from the profile and the DevRel audience)

checklist.name: Spec includes commercial intent
checklist.description: The presentation spec includes a commercial intent field

checklist.name: Spec includes shownotes slug
checklist.description: The presentation spec includes a shownotes slug derived from the speaker profile's URL pattern (e.g., sam.codes/ai-code-assistants or similar)

checklist.name: Anti-sell awareness
checklist.description: The abstract or spec acknowledges the sensitivity of the topic for a DevRel audience (people who promote AI tools), showing awareness of the anti-sell dynamic
